Trade/Device Name(s): Acucy Influenza A&B Test with the Acucy 2 System
Regulation Name(s): Influenza Virus Antigen Detection Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Acucy Influenza A&B Test with Acucy 2 System, a rapid chromatographic immunoassay for qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A and B antigens using nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: A rapid chromatographic immunoassay for qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral nucleoprotein antigens directly from anterior nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs of patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection, used with Acucy or Acucy 2 Reader as an aid in diagnosis; not intended for influenza C detection; negative results are presumptive and should be confirmed.
